list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Implemented User Permissionlevel management. Beautified UI. Fixed Bugs.

marker.ph:
<<Application.Resources> <Style x:Key="ComboBoxToggleButton" TargetType="ToggleButton"> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="ToggleButton"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Border x:Name="Border" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" CornerRadius="16" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}" BorderBrush="DarkGray" BorderThickness="1" />
<Path x:Name="Arrow" Grid.Column="1" Fill="{TemplateBinding Foreground}" Stroke="{TemplateBinding Foreground}" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Data="M 0 0 L 4 4 L 8 0 Z" /> </Grid> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> <ControlTemplate x:Key="ComboBoxTextBox" TargetType="TextBox"> <Border x:Name="PART_ContentHost" Focusable="True" /> </ControlTemplate>
<ControlTemplate x:Key="TBcontroltemplate" TargetType="{x:Type TextBoxBase}"> <Border Background="{TemplateBinding Background}" x:Name="Bd" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" CornerRadius="16"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> <ControlTemplate.Triggers> <Trigger Property="IsEnabled" Value="False"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="{DynamicResource {x:Static SystemColors.ControlBrushKey}}" TargetName="Bd" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="{DynamicResource {x:Static SystemColors.GrayTextBrushKey}}" /> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Width" Value="Auto"> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="100" /> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Height" Value="Auto"> <Setter Property="MinHeight" Value="32" /> </Trigger> </ControlTemplate.Triggers> </ControlTemplate>

task.summary: Added Lines to the Test XML. Added first checks to the XML Interpreter.
Overworked Packagestructured Restructured inheritation Added missing Processtags
Added new helper classes and overworked models
Added Methods to the networking components and created basic ui windows
Added method for posting ProcessTemplates to the server
Edited method for posting ProcessTemplates to the server
Implemented basic Authorization Added Login and Registration UI
Exported XML UI Rendering to a separate Class
Bringing Project back to the same level

MESSAGE.value: Initial Solution Creation
Class creation: - Process: Represents a whole Process - ProcessStep : Represents a step in a Process with sub tasks like dialogs

Reorganization of Projectstructure - DynamicDocsWpf: Solution - Organization: All Organizational and Documentation Files - Conceptfiles: Basic XML Files as concepts - Documentation: Documentation including Timeplans and UML

Creation of the Basic Model Classes: - Model - Base Classes: Contains the abstract parent classes for all others - Input Elements: Contains the objects containing all information regarding input tags - Surrounding Tags: Contains the objects for base tags

Created Basic Networking Class
Created UML for FileHandler and Networking
Reformatted Basic UML
Added Basic Post Methods to the REST API
Last Commit including necessary "Newtonsoft.Json"-Library to prepare Merge to Master Branch
Added Lines to the Test XML. Added first checks to the XML Interpreter.
Prepared first Databaseclasses
Overworked Packagestructured Restructured inheritation Added missing Processtags
Added new helper classes and overworked models
Added Methods to the networking components and created basic ui windows
Added database creation script
Added method for posting ProcessTemplates to the server
Edited method for posting ProcessTemplates to the server
Added loads of network an Databasefiles
Implemented basic Authorization Added Login and Registration UI
Exported XML UI Rendering to a separate Class
Bringing Project back to the same level
Started Revamping the whole Serverside
Revamp Serverside
Fixing the last bugs
